name: Crystalize! 2
summary:
The Quest for the Jewel Crown Has Begun!

Once upon a time, in a land far, far away, two love-struck Royals, kept apart in the kingdom of Crystelia, had lost hope of finding one another—and the Jewel Crown.

Match 3 or more colored stones to clear the Crystalize grid. Each completed level brings the Prince and Princess closer together! Get lost for hours in this exciting and challenging matching quest!
